title: Retry build & deploy Truly Tasker (Version 6) without source changes

requirements.summary: Retry the existing Version 6 build and production deployment with no application code changes, ensuring the deployed UI and localStorage behavior remain unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: Deployment completes successfully without requiring any source code modifications.
The deployed app loads in a browser and renders the existing 'Truly Tasker' UI (sidebar + sections: Dashboard, Calendar, Pomodoro Timer, Achievements, Settings).
No regressions: existing localStorage-backed behavior (tasks/days/pomodoro/theme) works as before after deployment.

file_operations.description: Add a deployment retry runbook documenting that Version 6 should be rebuilt and deployed without changing any existing project files, including a checklist to verify the deployed UI renders the existing Sidebar + sections (Dashboard/Calendar/Pomodoro Timer/Achievements/Settings) and that localStorage-backed behavior (tasks/days/pomodoro/theme) remains unchanged after deployment.
